ygData.subject: RE: Aviak Charms.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, they are No Drop, so you have to find someone who will let you loot them.  Most folks will want between 60 and 100pp to let you loot the charm. You might
ygData.messageBody:
Well, they are No Drop, so you have to find someone who will let you loot
them. Most folks will want between 60 and 100pp to let you loot the charm.
You might have to sit a lot waiting for someone to offer one though.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Omeg Felligan [SMTP:omeg_felligan@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 4:20 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Aviak Charms.
>
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> If I were to buy these from PCs about what do they run?
>
> thanks,
> Omeg
